Articles.Content: Can anyone tell me is there is a limit to the physical dimensions of a tech tree? My current project is producing a very, very tall, narrow tree and I want to avoid problems further down the line!
There is certainly a vertical and horizontal limit to the tech tree "canvas". Can't recall the exact numbers offhand, but you can see by dragging the tree menu around.

Do you need exact numbers? According to Sherkaner who made a tree mod it's around 4000 (horizontal) * 2400 (vertical) units/pixels/whatever.
